scenarios.title: Engine Overheating
scenarios.userQuery: The temp gauge is in the red and I'm stuck in traffic near Kandy. Should I turn the car off or will the fans handle it?

scenarios.title: Hybrid Battery Imbalance
scenarios.userQuery: My 'Check Hybrid System' light came on. The car feels sluggish when I pull away from a stop. Is my main battery dying?

scenarios.title: Oil Pressure Sensor Circuit
scenarios.userQuery: I just saw a 'Low Oil Pressure' warning. I checked the dipstick and it looks okay. Is it safe to drive to Colombo or is the sensor lying?

scenarios.title: CVT Transmission Slip
scenarios.userQuery: The engine revs up but the car doesn't speed up properly, especially on hills. Is my gearbox failing?

scenarios.title: Mass Air Flow Performance
scenarios.userQuery: The engine is idling really roughly and it nearly stalled at a red light. Could it be bad fuel or a sensor issue?

scenarios.title: Low System Voltage
scenarios.userQuery: My dashboard lights are flickering and the power steering felt heavy for a second. Is my 12V auxiliary battery failing?
